b9230def-ff10-4823-84de-5a5267e3afd9: Assault adamantine plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 17 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on the fore and 7 points on all other sides.

bf1a08da-c0f3-47df-a4eb-a8fe40d3bdda:
Fires 4 short-burning torpedo salvos with melta warheads. Each torpedo deals 27 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a direct hit and 18 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>
